key_mistakes.reason: Missed opportunity to capture the pawn
Allows White's piece to become more active
Misses the opportunity to apply pressure
Fails to capture a potentially dangerous pawn
Leads to loss of control in the position
Allows opponent to simplify the position favorably

recommendations: Focus on capturing critical pawns to secure a positional advantage.
Improve piece activity and coordination to exert consistent pressure.
Prioritize king safety, especially during transitions between phases.
Practice endgame scenarios to ensure optimal play when material is reduced.
